    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\View;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\View\Model AS ViewModel;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model AS Model;
    7: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource AS Resource;
    8:
    9: include_once (dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/default.php');
    10: include_once (dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/error.php');
    11: include_once (dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/header.php');
    12: include_once (dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/html.php');
    13: include_once (dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/json.php');
    14:
    15: /** ViewModel attribute object
    16: * @return Object $attributes
    17: */
    18: function Def() {
    19: $modparam = Env\Param('modifier');
    20: $mod = ($modparam != '')
    21: ? $modparam
    22: : ((in_array(Model\Method(), ['POST','PUT','DELETE'])) ? 'json' : 'html');
    23:
    24: $content_type = Model\ContentType($mod);
    25: return (object) [
    26: 'callbacks' => Model\Callbacks(),
    27: 'content-type' => $content_type,
    28: 'elements' => Env\Param('elements'),
    29: 'includes' => Model\Includes(),
    30: 'method' => Model\Method(),
    31: 'modifier' => $mod,
    32: 'paths' => Model\Paths(),
    33: 'template' => false,
    34: 'template-vars' => Resource\Variables()
    35: ];
    36: }
    37:
    38: /** Response definition object
    39: * @return Object $attributes
    40: */
    41: function DefResponse () {
    42: return (object) [
    43: 'content' => false,
    44: 'content-type' => false,
    45: 'error' => false,
    46: 'message' => false,
    47: 'meta-data' => false,
    48: 'response-code' => Model\ResponseCode(),
    49: 'size' => false
    50: ];
    51: }
    52:
    53: /** Render object
    54: * @return Object $obj ViewModel\DefResponse;
    55: */
    56: function Render() {
    57: $def = Def();
    58: $res = false;
    59:
    60: switch ($def->modifier) {
    61: case 'json':
    62: $res = ViewModel\Json\Render();
    63: break;
    64: case 'html':
    65: $res = ViewModel\Html\Render();
    66: break;
    67: default:
    68: $res = ViewModel\Def\Render();
    69: }
    70:
    71: if ($res) {
    72: ViewModel\Header\Set($res);
    73: }
    74:
    75: return $res;
    76: }
